statements: DELETE FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE date = '2022-01-10' AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE waste_weight > 100 AND composition = 'Recyclable';
DELETE FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE quantity > 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_intake_records WHERE weight > 1000 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution';
DELETE FROM waste_composition WHERE composition_percentage <= 0.05 AND composition_type = 'Plastic';
